InputSentence1: Juan wanted a new guitar more than anything.
InputSentence2: He decided to save up money to buy one.
InputSentence3: All summer he worked, saving up every penny.
InputSentence4: Finally, he was able to buy the guitar.

InputSentence1: The kids went to the graveyard.
InputSentence2: The came upon a grave with chains.
InputSentence3: Some of the chains had been broken.
RandomFifthSentenceQuiz1: They didn't want to go there again.
